review: Hosa patch cables are the best for the buck. Great sound and flexible. I'm a firm Hosa cable fan. Love these little guys.
The joyo tremolo is awesome, best for the buck. It's just as good as any, I love the joyo pedals. affordable and doesn't break the bank
Everything I wanted and more. I love the joyo pedals. They are amazing and they don't break the bank, awesome
I love this it's do fun to play with. Every pedal that I buy of joyo amaze me. They are well built with a sound that is beautiful for that price. I'm sold out on joyo pedals.
Awesome pedal, I love the joyo pedals, they don't break the bank and sound awesome. Glad I bought this pedal
